title: E91: SoftBank's $21B+ Vision Fund loss, signals of a bubble, macro picture, Trump raided by FBI
itunes:title: E91: SoftBank's $21B+ Vision Fund loss, signals of a bubble, macro picture, Trump raided by FBI
description:
0:00 Bestie intros

3:02 Where Masa and SoftBank went wrong, why VC isn't scaleable, Vision Fund impact

27:59 Metrics that signify a bubble or the top of a market

36:46 US macroeconomic picture

50:45 FBI raids Mar-a-Lago, Trump back in news
